message: Let's split it 60/40, it's a fair start!

I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I want 55 and you can have 45. Can you accept that?
I'm willing to compromise, but I think 58/42 is a fairer split. It's still close to equal, but I get a bit more.
I'm willing to give you a bit more, but I need a bigger share to make it worth my while
I'm not happy about the 45/55 split, but I'm willing to make a counteroffer. How about 50/50 again? It's not ideal, but I think it's a fairer split considering the reduced value of the money.
I'm not willing to give up much more. I think 52/48 is a fairer split, considering the reduced value of the money. You can try to do better than that if you want.
I'm not budging, I think I deserve a bigger share, especially considering the inflation

I'm really disappointed with the 40/60 split. I think it's unfair, especially considering the reduced value of the money. I'm willing to make one more counteroffer. How about 45/55? It's still not ideal, but I think it's a slightly more reasonable split.
I'm not willing to give up any more. I think 50/50 is the fairest split, considering the reduced value of the money. If you don't accept this, I'm willing to walk away.
